Html: I just noticed that Mining is now missing from the Profession Buffs in 2.2.14.  Is that intentional?
Can you clarify what you mean? The buff is indeed still there.

Also depends on your model.  If you're a DPS class, and your model does not include any sort of survivability calculations, the mining buff (As well as some other purely health-related buffs) may be counted (correctly, in this case) as irrelevant.

If you're going to post about any sort of question or issue, PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE post which model you're talking about.
Sorry, I'm a rogue.  I didn't know there would be a difference between the availability of the buff depending on the model considering it was there in version 2.2.13 for rogue.
